summary.description:
A Public Omics Database for Systematic and Comparable Information of CMV.

CMBdb (CytoMegaloVirus DataBase).

Cytomegalovirus is a double-stranded DNA virus in the same family as herpesvirus found every where,infect people of all ages.

Cytomegalovirus Treatment & Management Kauser Akhter, MD Assistant Professor, Department of Internal Medicine, Florida State University College of Medicine; Associate Program Director, Infectious Diseases Fellowship Program, Orlando Health; Updated: Jan 05, 2017
summary.name: CMVdb
